statements: DELETE FROM CompetencyAssessments WHERE employee_id = 500 AND assessment_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM CompetencyAssessments WHERE assessment_id = 1 AND employee_id = 100;
DELETE FROM CompetencyAssessments WHERE assessment_score > 80 AND assessment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM competency_assessments WHERE competency_score < 70 AND employee_id = 1001;
DELETE FROM development_plans WHERE target_completion_date < '2022-12-31' AND employee_id = 2005;
DELETE FROM Assessments WHERE user_id = 5 AND competency_id = 3 AND assessment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM DevelopmentPlans WHERE target_completion_date < CURRENT_DATE;
